main event: A witness observed a single object with flashing lights in Girard, Ohio, on 6 August 1966.
interesting points: The observed object was about the size of a small airplane and appeared at an altitude of 600 to 800 feet., The object was in sight for about 5 seconds but had been seen at a slow speed for 15 to 20 minutes prior to the report., The witness attempted to focus their field glasses on the object but was unable to do so in time., The report concluded it was likely an astro (meteor) due to insufficient data., No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with flashing lights
witness description: Male, age 54, reported the sighting to the Youngstown Municipal Airport Control Tower
